General.Name: SMRT Holdings Bhd
General.Description: SMRT Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, provides various education and learning solutions primarily in Malaysia. The company operates in three segments: Education, Training, and Technology. The Education segment operates educational institutions, as well as offers education management services. The Training segment provides human resources (HR) development training, consulting, outsourcing, events, learning resources, and advisory support services. The Technology segment offers software consultancy and development, and related services. SMRT Holdings Berhad also provides human resource software development and marketing services; technology consulting services; and IT solutions related to telecommunication, as well as management services. The company was formerly known as SMR Technologies Berhad and changed its name to SMRT Holdings Berhad in July 2013. SMRT Holdings Berhad was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Cyberjaya, Malaysia.
